comments: Coordination sequence for 4-dimensional cyclotomic lattice Z[zeta_10].
references: M. O'Keeffe, Coordination sequences for lattices, Zeit. f. Krist., 210 (1995), 905-908.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
M. Beck and S. Hosten, Cyclotomic polytopes and growth series of cyclotomic lattices, arXiv math.CO/0508136
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (4,-6,4,-1).
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[(1 + 6 x + 16 x^2 + 6 x^3 + x^4)/(1 - x)^4, {x, 0, 50}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Oct 15 2013 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
